title: New Client Screen Size is awkward...
body: It seems like the new client either covers up my task bar, or my task bar covers up my client. I'm not sure if anyone else is having this issue, I just thought I would ask. Are there plans to be able to better resize it, or even a chance that they will add a maximize button to the client so I can resize it better?

replies.body: The updated client sounds like it's overscaled.  Try pressing Ctrl + Down Arrow to scale it down.  Ctrl and - key could do it too.  Let me know if that helps!

Ty, this worked extremely well! Is there a guide to all of the client functions?

Also, ty ty ty ty ty, this makes using the client so much easier.

Glad to hear it worked!  Nope, the updated client is still in testing so you might run into issues like with scaling.  This was a one off case with a workaround, so there aren't any functions.  Hope that clears things up.  :D
